data.title: Clinical Test Request Forms
data.text:
Clinical Test Request Forms - Human specimens only

A completed test request form is required to perform testing.

Affix a patient information label to the test request form or fully complete the information.

Specimen must have two identifiers that match the test request form.

Mark the test(s) to be performed.

Tests on human samples must be ordered by a licensed medical provider.

How to complete your test request form

COVID-19 Electronic Test Request Form

All facilities should use the "COVID-19/Flu Electronic Test Request Form" that is part of the OpenELIS Web Portal to order the 2019 Novel Coronavirus Diagnostic Test, Influenza SARS-CoV-2 (Flu SC2) Multiplex, SARS-CoV-2 Next Generation Sequencing, and SARS-CoV-2 IgG Antibody tests instead of using the PDF form that is generated below.

Apply for an OpenELIS Web Portal account
